resources.string:
Each avalanche forecast region is colored based on the overall danger level

- Use the buttons at the top to select the forecast timeframe

- Tap the bottom legend to see descriptions of the danger levels

- Click a region on the map to go to the detailed avalanche forecast

Avalanche Android v%1$s
